hero_section.title: Considering a Professional Flight Program at a University?
hero_section.subtitle: Explore the benefits of completing your flight training at a Part 61 school instead of a university

intro_section.tagline: Take Control of Your Flight Training
intro_section.title: Is a Pro Flight Program the Right Fit?
intro_section.description: You may want to consider Part 61 flight schools like Blue Skies Above, which offer flexibility, personalized instruction, and cost-effective training to help you earn your pilot certifications at your own pace. If you're looking for a more tailored approach outside of a university program, this path may be ideal for you.

benefits.text: Recession-proof your career: Earn a separate degree as a backup while completing your certifications and ratings at a Part 61 school.
Save time and money: Many students in university flight programs accumulate up to $500K in student loans, while you can go from zero to hero for under $100K at Blue Skies Above.

Expand your career options: A university pro flight program awards a degree solely in aviation, but choosing a different degree provides greater flexibility in case of industry downturns, medical disqualifications, or furloughs.

get_started_section.title: Take Off With Blue Skies Above
get_started_section.description: At Blue Skies Above, we make learning to fly an exciting, structured, and rewarding experience. Whether you're pursuing a lifelong dream or an aviation career, our dedicated instructors are here to guide you every step of the way.

form_section.title: Register now!
form_section.description: If you aim to complete your Private Pilot Certificate by the spring semester, we recommend starting at least six months in advance, regardless of prior experience.

testimonial_section.title: We are the flight training experts in Lanett, AL
testimonial_section.subtitle: Providing pilot training to the Auburn, Columbus, Opelika, LaGrange, Montgomery areas in Alabama and Georgia
testimonial_section.description: As the only independent flight school with a Cessna fleet in the area, we pride ourselves in training safe and highly proficient pilots. Come see what everyone's talking about! Visit Blue Skies Above and begin flight training today.
